member.name: T:bbv.Common.IO.StreamLoggerStream
member.summary: Logs the data that is written to and read from a stream.

member.name: F:bbv.Common.IO.StreamLoggerStream.bytesPerLine
member.summary: The number of bytes that are written per line in the log.

member.name: F:bbv.Common.IO.StreamLoggerStream.blockLength
member.summary: The number of bytes that are written as a block. After a block a space is written.

member.name: F:bbv.Common.IO.StreamLoggerStream.log
member.summary: The logger that is used for writing the log output.

member.name: M:bbv.Common.IO.StreamLoggerStream.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,log4net.ILog,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The stream that is logged.
The logger that is used for logging.
The number of bytes that are written per line in the log.
The number of bytes that are written as a block. After a block a space is written.

member.name: M:bbv.Common.IO.StreamLoggerStream.Read(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read.
member.param: An array of bytes. When this method returns, the buffer contains the specified byte array with the values between offset and (offset + count - 1) replaced by the bytes read from the current source.
The zero-based byte offset in buffer at which to begin storing the data read from the current stream.
The maximum number of bytes to be read from the current stream.
member.returns: The total number of bytes read into the buffer. This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero (0) if the end of the stream has been reached.
member.exception: The sum of offset and count is larger than the buffer length.
Methods were called after the stream was closed.
The stream does not support reading.

member.name: M:bbv.Common.IO.StreamLoggerStream.ReadByte
member.summary: Reads a byte from the stream and advances the position within the stream by one byte, or returns -1 if at the end of the stream.
member.returns: The unsigned byte cast to an Int32, or -1 if at the end of the stream.
member.exception: The stream does not support reading.
Methods were called after the stream was closed.

member.name: M:bbv.Common.IO.StreamLoggerStream.Write(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, writes a sequence of bytes to the current stream and advances the current position within this stream by the number of bytes written.
member.param: An array of bytes. This method copies count bytes from buffer to the current stream.
The zero-based byte offset in buffer at which to begin copying bytes to the current stream.
The number of bytes to be written to the current stream.
member.exception: The stream does not support writing.
Methods were called after the stream was closed.
The sum of offset and count is greater than the buffer length.

member.name: M:bbv.Common.IO.StreamLoggerStream.WriteByte(System.Byte)
member.summary: Writes a byte to the current position in the stream and advances the position within the stream by one byte.
member.param: The byte to write to the stream.
member.exception: Methods were called after the stream was closed.
The stream does not support writing, or the stream is already closed.

member.name: T:bbv.Common.IO.StreamLoggerStream.LogHelper
member.summary: Helper class for logging data with log4net

member.name: M:bbv.Common.IO.StreamLoggerStream.LogHelper.Debug(log4net.ILog,System.String,System.Byte[],System.Int64,System.Int64,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Logs a byte array for debugging
member.param: The logger to which the data is logged.
A message that is displayed before the data.
The byte array that is logged
The index of the first byte that is logged.
The number of bytes that are logged.
Number of bytes that are displayedPerLine
Defines how many bytes are in a block. A space is inserted after each block

member.name: M:bbv.Common.IO.StreamLoggerStream.LogHelper.LogBuffer(bbv.Common.IO.StreamLoggerStream.LogHelper.LogMethod,System.String,System.Byte[],System.Int64,System.Int64,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Logs a byte array
member.param: The method that is used for logging.
A message that is displayed before the data.
The byte array that is logged
The index of the first byte that is logged.
The number of bytes that are logged.
Number of bytes that are displayedPerLine
Defines how many bytes are in a block. A space is inserted after each block

member.name: T:bbv.Common.IO.StreamLoggerStream.LogHelper.LogMethod
member.summary: This delegate is internally used to pass the log method of the to the shared method
member.param: The message that is logged.
